description:
Cannot search text.
Bookmarks are supposed to be removed using a text editor on an internal data file (workable but a little awkward)
I hope it improves!

I really like Geopard. I have actually submitted a bunch of GitHub issues. Development seems to have seized, I hope it'll resume soon!

Note: Geopard is currently not capable of managing or submitting certificates for authentication.
summary: Very nice, seems to be abandoned though

description:
Of course it needs a lot of improvements... But yet it's a perfect start for your app... Most of Gemini clients are not maintained anymore and/or don't have the look and ease of use of leopard...

Keep continue... Gemini needs a good client.
Perfectly integrated to the GNOME desktop. Uses the most modern tech like libadwaita.

summary: Amazing gemini browser with amazing UI
